name: Zendesk
description: I was apart of the Customer Service Admin Experience (CSAX) team. Our mission was to improve the admin experience. We also worked on some internal tools as well for improving the Developer Experience (DevEx).

name: ideas42 Venture Studio
description: An ambitious venture studio with the mission of helping entreprenuers from diverse backgrounds execute on their dreams. We worked with our entreprenuers in residence from ideation phase to web application within 18 months!
